subject: Baseball
Free Agents (Sports)
lead_paragraph: General Manager Sandy Alderson signed the right-handers Jon Rauch and Frank Francisco, and dealt Angel Pagan to the Giants for Andres Torres and Ramon Ramirez.
snippet: General Manager Sandy Alderson signed the right-handers Jon Rauch and Frank Francisco, and dealt Angel Pagan to the Giants for Andres Torres and Ramon Ramirez.
